original_text: But many of the priests and Levites and heads of fathers' houses, old men who had seen the first house, wept with a loud voice when they saw the foundation of this house being laid, though many shouted aloud for joy,
korean_text: 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 나이 많은 족장들은 첫 성전을 보았으므로 이제 이 성전의 기초가 놓임을 보고 대성통곡하였으나 여러 사람은 기쁨으로 크게 함성을 지르니

sentences.original_text: But many of the priests and Levites
old men who had seen the first house
when they saw the foundation of this house
though many shouted aloud for joy
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 많은 사람들이 기쁨으로 큰 소리로 외쳤지만
